casebody.data:
Thursday, October 15, 1998 98-1483. State v. Jones.

MOTION DOCKET

Ashtabula C.P. No. 97CR221. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Ashtabula County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time for transmission of record,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time for transmission of the record be, and hereby is, granted, and the time for transmitting the record is extended to November 23, 1998. No further extensions mil be granted.
